page.title: 04TRADE IN WOODHALL SPA
page.content: {TRADE IN WOODHALL SPA} Woodhall boasts some 80 different businesses;foodshops of all variety, shoes,clothes,bedding,gifts,dairy,wine ,Building Societies,banks,estate agents,public houses,hotels etc.We have some first class builders,hotels and one very good nursing home.We also have four good retirment homes.The general trade in the Spa has been very good in the last ten years or so,but it is now more difficult to maintain, owing to the large stores.Tourism is beginning to play a an important part in our trade at the Spa and in the last 2 years has helped tremendously. It should help the Spa to maintain the high standard of business already here but it is doubtful if it would support new shops.The Spa needs to expand in its development of new houses to enjoy the present trend of trade.
